officers2324.name: Prabhvir S. Babra
officers2324.officer_desc: I am Prabhvir Babra and the President of the club. I have an interest in Computer Security, robotics, and low level systems. In Pokemon Showdown, I primarily play Gen 9 OU and my favorite Pokemon is Venemoth. I love Pokemon because of the depth of the mechanics and mind games that arise in normal gameplay.

officers2324.name: Ryan Shen
officers2324.officer_desc: My name's Ryan Shen, rising senior at MSJ and Vice President of the club. I got into competitive pokemon because I grew up with Pokemon since gen 4, and I like the game's interesting RPG mechanics in the competitive scene. I like listening to music and reading about history.

officers2324.name: Raaif Qazi
officers2324.officer_desc: My name is Raaif, and the thing I like most about competitive Pokemon is team building. Building around a certain Pokemon or a certain archetype is fun and rewarding when you play. Pokemon is one of my biggest hobbies but I also like to play a variety of other games.

officers2324.name: Alexander Lau
officers2324.officer_desc: Hello! My name is Alexander Lau, and I'm (also)* a rising senior. I've been a longtime player of the mainline Pokemon games and thus have branched into competitive Pokemon too! Other than that I enjoy computer science sometimes.

officers2324.name: Aaron Chen
officers2324.officer_desc: My name is Aaron Chen, a rising senior. I got into competitive pokemon because I really wanted to play around with megas in gen 6 and got into Showdown. In my spare time, when not playing Showdown, I am often listening to music and/or reading.
